creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: large rock formation at R, with 2 similar formations in distance at L; small flock of flying birds at L; Li River, Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'#10093 [crossed out]/#10003/\'CAMEL MOUNTAINS\'\', in black ink, on back; \'#A-13\', in blue ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP/60 CONTINENTAL AVE/FOREST HILLS, NY, 11375, USA\', stamped, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back
title: Camel Mountains
